definition: generic term for birds and animals/birds/to capture (old)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: 'We have been paying magnificent attention' to the possibility of human illnesses, Mr. Mao said.
sentences.chinese: 毛群安表示，我们高度重视可能的人感染禽流感疫情。

sentences.english: Can migratory birds carry H5N1 over long distances?
sentences.chinese: 候鸟会长距离携带H5N1型禽流感病毒吗？

sentences.english: Shanxi confirmed human avian influenza cases, patients recovered and were discharged today.
sentences.chinese: 山西省确诊的人禽流感个案，患者于今日康复出院。

sentences.english: Nowadays the bird flu has been the frontpage news all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 现在全世界禽流感成了头条新闻。

sentences.english: Avian influenza is first of all an animal disease that requires a veterinarian response.
sentences.chinese: 禽流感首先是一种动物病害，要求采取兽医应对行动。

sentences.english: Indonesias Health Ministry says a 17-year old woman has died of bird flu.
sentences.chinese: 印度尼西亚卫生部说，一名17岁的妇女死于禽流感。

sentences.english: Results This method could obtain AIV specific transfer factor.
sentences.chinese: 结果采用本法可获得禽流感病毒特异性转移因子。

sentences.english: flu has killed 257 of the 421 people who have contracted it.
sentences.chinese: 相反，禽流感感染421人中257人死亡。

sentences.english: It has killed more than 200 people since 2003.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年，已有200多人死于禽流感病毒。

sentences.english: Human cases so far have been traced to infection directly from diseased birds.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止发现的禽流感患者都是直接被病禽感染的。

sentences.english: The bird-flu virus manages to become easily transmittable between humans.
sentences.chinese: 禽流感病毒变成可以在人与人之间轻易传染。

sentences.english: Avian influenza with low virulence was characterized by respiratory symptom and low productirity.
sentences.chinese: 低致病力禽流感常引起呼吸道症状，产蛋量下降。

sentences.english: We are using that knowledge for predictive and preventive work on avian flu.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在将这种知识应用于禽流感的预测和预防工作。

sentences.english: Indonesia has reported more human deaths -- 55 -- than any other nation.
sentences.chinese: 印尼死于禽流感的人数达55人，超过任何其他国家。

sentences.english: Of 80 cases confirmed in Indonesia, 62 have been fatal.
sentences.chinese: 印尼已证实有80人感染禽流感，其中62人死亡。

sentences.english: She, Chen Hualan, was an outstanding female scientist, who made a great contribution to the Bird Flu research field.
sentences.chinese: 她是在禽流感领域有杰出贡献的女科学家，陈化兰。

definition: type A influenza/abbr. for 甲型H1N1流感/refers to H1N1 influenza of 2009
